name: part_000
file: tmp_【3D Live】Let My Voice Enchant You Tonight! #3DKobornDay2025 [jNCGOv8Zz1A]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Kobo performing an opening song in a blue idol outfit.
Visual sequence introducing special guests with on-screen text.
Kobo performing 'Anata no Koto ga Suki da Nante Ienain Desu' with a guitar.
scenes.song_name: Anata no Koto ga Suki da Nante Ienain Desu

subtitles.original: The night shines brighter when she sings...
subtitles.english: The night shines brighter when she sings...

subtitles.original: Special guests are here to join the fun
subtitles.english: Special guests are here to join the fun

subtitles.original: so don't blink
subtitles.english: so don't blink

subtitles.original: The moment we've all been waiting for...
subtitles.english: The moment we've all been waiting for...

subtitles.original: あぁ、ふわふわ...
subtitles.english: Ah, fluff fluff...

subtitles.original: こんなことにな
subtitles.english: I never thought

subtitles.original: るなんて
subtitles.english: it would happen

subtitles.original: 出会う前にわかってたら
subtitles.english: If only I knew before we met

subtitles.original: もう少しだけシャンとした僕を
subtitles.english: I could have shown you a cooler side of me

subtitles.original: 見せれたはずなんだ
subtitles.english: I'm sure I could have

subtitles.original: どうしたらいいのかなんて
subtitles.english: What should I do?

subtitles.original: 頭ではわかってるけど
subtitles.english: I know it in my head, but

subtitles.original: 何気ないちょっとした言葉で
subtitles.english: Just from your casual words

subtitles.original: わぁ、おっ、おっ
subtitles.english: Wah, oh, oh

subtitles.original: 嬉しい顔が出ちゃって
subtitles.english: A happy face just slips out

subtitles.original: こんなバレバレじゃカッコ悪いな
subtitles.english: It's so uncool to be this obvious

subtitles.original: けどこのままじゃ引き下がれないよな
subtitles.english: But I can't back down now

subtitles.original: でも今更カッコつけて照れくさくて
subtitles.english: But now it's embarrassing to try and look cool

subtitles.original: あなたのことが好きだなんて言えないんです
subtitles.english: I can't say that I like you

subtitles.original: この気持ち伝わるかな
subtitles.english: Will these feelings reach you?

subtitles.original: 浮き足立って空回り
subtitles.english: I'm restless and spinning my wheels

subtitles.original: 何も言えずまたさよなら
subtitles.english: Saying goodbye again without saying anything

subtitles.original: あなたのことが好きすぎてたまらないんです
subtitles.english: I like you so much it's unbearable

subtitles.original: 明日こそは言えるかな
subtitles.english: Will I be able to say it tomorrow?

subtitles.original: あなたも僕に同じように
subtitles.english: If you felt the same way about me

subtitles.original: 恋してたら
subtitles.english: If you were in love

subtitles.original: なんて考えちゃうんだ
subtitles.english: That's what I end up thinking

subtitles.original: 会えない日が続いてる
subtitles.english: Days without seeing you continue

subtitles.original: このままじゃよろしくない
subtitles.english: This isn't good

subtitles.original: 会ったところで何ができるって
subtitles.english: Not that I can do anything if we meet

subtitles.original: わけじゃないんだけど
subtitles.english: It's not like that, but

subtitles.original: こんな恋は二度とないな
subtitles.english: I'll never have a love like this again

subtitles.original: 頭ではわかってるけど
subtitles.english: I know it in my head, but

subtitles.original: 眩しすぎその笑顔が
subtitles.english: That smile is too bright

subtitles.original: わぁ、おっ、おっ
subtitles.english: Wah, oh, oh

subtitles.original: 僕を焦らせるんだ
subtitles.english: It makes me panic

subtitles.original: ずっと見ていたくなるような
subtitles.english: I want to keep watching you forever

subtitles.original: 独り占めしたくなってしまうよな
subtitles.english: I start wanting to have you all to myself

subtitles.original: こんな気持ちわかるのかな
subtitles.english: Do you understand these feelings?

subtitles.original: あなたが笑ってるならそれでいいんです
subtitles.english: If you are smiling, then that's enough

subtitles.original: でも隣は僕がいいな
subtitles.english: But I wish I was the one next to you

subtitles.original: もしかしたら実は
subtitles.english: Maybe, actually

subtitles.original: ずっと気づいてる
subtitles.english: You've noticed all along

subtitles.original: じゃないかな
subtitles.english: Haven't you?

subtitles.original: あなたのことが好きすぎてたまらないんです
subtitles.english: I like you so much it's unbearable
